title: Retro Inline font
content:
This sample was taken from stock art - the fonts have been converted to outlines. Fairly sure the 3D/shadow effects are not part of the font.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140712004336im_/http:/typophile.com/files/vintage_5430.jpg)
author: whatyouare

comments.content: **[Big Noodle Titling](http://web.archive.org/web/20140712004336/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Dafont-1&ffam=BigNoodleTitling%20-%20Regular&fid=ff78c5e2b6c3846035dae28cdaa65583&fsize=60&text=GEORGIA&fit=1)** by James Arboghast (Sentinel Type, 2003, Free for personal use) looks like an exact match if you add the inline stroke and the 3D effect
Awesome! I didn't think the inline stroke was an after-effect of the artist, but maybe it is. You're right, the type looks to be an exact match otherwise. Thanks for the help.
